# HttpClientServiceSettings.CompressRequests property

True to compress HTTP request bodies; false to not compress. The default is API-specific.

```csharp
public bool? CompressRequests { get; set; }
```

## Remarks

Request bodies will be compressed with `Content-Encoding: gzip`.
